mapper.select: SELECT h.hospital_id,h.`hospital_name`, h.`type`,IFNULL(devices.device_sum, 0) AS device_sum FROM agent_hospital AS ag INNER JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = ag.`hospital_id` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT hospital_id,COUNT(device_number) AS device_sum FROM device GROUP BY hospital_id ) AS devices ON ag.hospital_id = devices.hospital_id WHERE ag.`agent_id` = #{userId}
